translations: n.（Fedora）人名；（俄）费奥多拉；（西、塞）费多拉

sentences.sentence: Bad news for those who are tired of seeing fedoras: this style refuses to die.
sentences.translation: 对于那些已经对于软呢帽产生审美疲劳的人们来说，这是一个坏消息：该风格依然流行。

sentences.sentence: If one looks at the Hoover dam being built, you can see all the, all the workmen out with their fedoras.
sentences.translation: 如果有人见过大坝的修建过程，就会发现所有的工人都只戴着软呢帽。

sentences.sentence: Wide-brimmed fedoras not only inherit all the advantages of the classic fedora but also have more romantic, feminine and retro qualities.
sentences.translation: 宽檐软呢帽不仅继承了经典软呢帽的所有优点，而且还增添了更多浪漫，阴柔和复古的元素。
